devdoc.details: Enables signing SeedFactory.deploySeed() transaction before sending it to Gnosis Safe.

params._gasPrice: gas price for gnosis safe transaction.
params._gasToken: token which gas needs to paid for gnosis safe transaction.
params._refundReceiver: address account to receive refund for remaining gas.
params._safeTxGas: safe transaction gas for gnosis safe.

params._hash: Encoded transaction hash supplied to verify signature.
params._signature: Signature that needs to be verified.

devdoc.title: PrimeDAO Signer Contract
